schedule: Jakarta – Kupang – Darwin – Wyndham – Broome –      Port Hedland – Perth
circumstances: En route, the aircraft was shot down by the pilot of a Japanese fighter (Mitsubishi Zero). The crew reduced his altitude in an attempt to make an emergency landing in a field located near Carnot Peak, west of Beagle Bay. Three passengers and a crew member were killed while all eight other occupants were rescued.
probable_cause: Shot down by a Japanese fighter.
